Build ID: 20110707182747

Steps to reproduce:

1. 2 Monitor PC , Windows 7 professional
2. Left Firefox 5.0.1, right Thunderbird 5.0
3. trying moving X mails from inbox to trash/folder (drag+drop) and move the mouse pointer on the left monitor where the Firefox window is open




Actual results:

Both, Firefox and Thunderbird, dont react anymore immediatelly after the mouse-pointer hits the Firefox Window. Mouse button (left) was still pressed.

Both programms dont react anymore, have to be closed via taskmanager


Expected results:

Nothing xD
